frontmatter.title: Multilingual blog with Jekyll 1.5
frontmatter.description: What changed with Jekyll v1.5.1 if you want to build a multilingual blog.

frontmatter.title: Building a multilanguage Jekyll blog
frontmatter.description: As a first post, what about sharing the way I managed to build this blog? Having a both english and french Jekyll website is not that hard, but you have to care about some crucial points.
